snippet.title: Babette - Indie Horror Game - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Official trailer for the upcoming virtual pet horror game 'Babette'.

WISHLIST BABETTE NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3140110/Babette/

Summary:
"There's this old 90s virtual pet game at a yard sale. It's called 'Babette'. Now you can play with Babette the cat from the comfort of your bedroom. Just you and her! Keep Babette happy by playing with her, feeding her, and more! Except... Babette's more than just a cat. And she's coming for you."

FIND BABETTE HERE
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3140110/Babette/
Itchio: https://roaringluck.itch.io/babette
Humble Bundle: https://www.humblebundle.com/g/babette
Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/babette/918272

Join the Babette Discord server: https://discord.com/invite/VyfZDx6JA5
